name: DateFormat
description: A ready to use DNB date formatter.

props.name: value
props.doc: The date that will be formatted.

props.name: dateStyle
props.doc: Defines the style used to format the date. Also affects duration formatting when using ISO 8601 duration strings. Defaults to `long`.

props.name: timeStyle
props.doc: Defines the style used to format the time. If provided, time is included in the output.

props.name: dateTimeSeparator
props.doc: Custom separator used between date and time when both are rendered (e.g. " - "). Defaults to a comma.

props.name: relativeTime
props.doc: If set to `true`, actual dates will be formatted as relative time (e.g., "2 hours ago"). ISO 8601 duration strings (e.g., "PT1H") are automatically detected and formatted without this prop. Defaults to `false`.

props.name: relativeTimeStyle
props.doc: Defines the style used to format relative time. Defaults to `dateStyle` when not provided.

props.name: relativeTimeReference
props.doc: A function that returns a Date object to use as the reference point for relative time calculations. If not provided, the current time is used.

props.name: locale
props.doc: A string in [Intl.DateTimeFormat locale](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Intl#locales_argument) format. Duration formatting supports all locales using the browser's built-in internationalization. Defaults to `nb-NO`.

props.name: skeleton
props.doc: If set to `true`, an overlaying skeleton with animation will be shown.
